name: check username pw
unsucess Login
sucess Login
query account pw
check ID, permission, get in/out
search ID in db
func:
var id = msg.payload
var query = 'select E.id, E.name, E.role, E.permission, AR.time_get_in as \'time_in\', NOW() as \'time_out\'  from employee E left join currently_at_room AR on E.id = AR.id where E.id = \'' + id + '\''
msg.topic =  query
msg.id = id
return msg;

func:
msg.payload = 'accept'
return msg;

name: insert qry to currently_at_room
func:
var id = msg.id
var query = 'insert into currently_at_room values(\'' + id + '\', NOW())'
msg.topic = query
return msg;

name: delete id in currently_at_room
func:
var id = msg.id
var query = 'delete from currently_at_room where id = \'' + id + '\''
msg.topic = query
return msg;

query all
func:
var query
query = 'select id, name, role, permission from employee'
msg.topic = query
return msg;

name: push delete ID
func:
flow.set('idDel', msg.payload)
return msg;

name: create delete query
func:
var id = flow.get('idDel') || ''
var query = 'delete from employee where id = \'' + id + '\''
msg.topic = query
return msg;

name: push ID update
func:
flow.set('idUpdate', msg.payload)
return msg;

name: push permission
func:
flow.set('permission', msg.payload)
return msg;

name: create update query
func:
var id = flow.get('idUpdate') || ''
var permission = flow.get('permission') || ''
var query = 'update employee set permission = \'' + permission + '\' where id = \'' + id + '\' and role = \'E\''
msg.topic = query
return msg;

func:

var query = 'select * from employee where id = \'' + id + '\''
msg.topic =  query
msg.id = id
